params.name: forward_params
params.description: Parameters passed to the model generation/forward method. forward_params are always passed to theunderlying model.

params.name: generate_kwargs
params.description: The dictionary of ad-hoc parametrization of generate_config to be used for the generation call. For acomplete overview of generate, check the followingguide. generate_kwargs areonly passed to the underlying model if the latter is a generative model.

return: A dict or a list of dict
